body.content:
Greetings to you and your family,

I am  Mrs.Mariam Kareem a widow to late Mr.daniel Kareem, I am 59
years old, suffering from long time cancerous tumors. From all
indications my condition is really
deteriorating and it's quite obvious that I won't live more than 2
months according to my doctor.
I have funds (4.5 MILLION EURO) which I inherited from my late husband
Mr.daniel Kareem ,which he deposited in a bank here.
I contact you because i need someone to administer the account to his
or her name, to use these funds for Charity work, to build and
charitable organization, and help the Less Privileges.
I took this decision, since I don't have any child that will inherit
this fund, and I don't want in a way my late husband’s hard earned
money will be misused.
I decided to confide in you  to secure this fund and do this
humanitarian project. contact email.. markareem01@yahoo.com
God loves us, Remain bless.

I wait to hear from you .
Yours sincerely
Mrs Mariam Kareem

header.subject: Greetings to you and your family,
